message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, Bob. I get slightly more since I'm proposing.
I think it's fair to split the money a bit closer to 50/50, with me getting slightly more since I'm the one proposing this time. Let's end this quickly and avoid any further inflation.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.  We both lose if we drag this out further.
